title: BET365
description: I work as Front End Developer in a team of 5 developers, Our mission is to redesign, improve the user experience, add some features and recently we are redesigning the website to be responsive with a keys improvements of the core system.

title: Granby Marketing
description: I worked as a web developer, my role was the maintenance in-house systems, development of promotional websites and one of the big project was to write the specifications and test plans for a brand new warehouse system..

title: QISoft
description: This is my first job in England, as a support developer, my mission was to communicate with the customers to inform of the new features of the software and collect the bugs. I had to organize the bugs in a level of priority to allow the team to fix them during each sprint..

title: Societe General
description: In my last job in France, my mission was to maintain the back office system who was in charge to manage different accounts/transactions of the bank.

title: MPhasis Wyde
description: This is my first job after graduation, I was working as a software developer in an insurance company.

title: Multitoll
description: My first job as a software developer, I alternate 5 weeks of company and 4 weeks of school for 4 years (Master M2I and Master SIIC). I saw a variety of technologies and my first experience working as a team in a dynamic and complex environment.
